mapper.insert: INSERT INTO evaluation ( evaluationCode, managerCode, memberCode, managerGradeCode, evaluationStart, evaluationEnd, evaluation1, evaluation2, evaluation3, evaluation4, evaluationDay, evaluationGrade, evaluationMemo ) VALUES ( #{evaluationCode}, #{managerCode}, #{memberCode}, #{managerGradeCode}, #{evaluationStart}, #{evaluationEnd}, #{evaluation1}, #{evaluation2}, #{evaluation3}, #{evaluation4}, #{evaluationDay}, #{evaluationGrade}, #{evaluationMemo})
